p.s: Bangles are bracelets that have been a fashion staple for decades .
If you have design talent and are interested in selling handmade jewelry , making and selling bangles could be a great work from home business niche .
Specialize in fun decorated plastic bangles or make more intricate cuff bangles from wire .
To get started , learn how to start a bangle selling business , market your products and grow your business .

item.s: Decide what kinds of bangles to sell and who to sell to . Start by defining your target customer , and then figure out what kind of products the customer will buy .
For example , plastic bangles can be marketed to children or young women , while wire or metal cuff bangles are a good choice for adults .
Any type of bangle can be promoted as a gift item or customized for special occasions like holidays , weddings and parties .

item.s: Find and order supplies .
Build a relationship with suppliers who are reliable and sell quality products .
Keep track of where you order supplies from and the item numbers for quick ordering .
Some supplies you may need include plastic bangles , wire , beads , pliers and glue , depending on what type of bangles you decide to make .

figure.rend: Start a Bangle Selling Business Step 2.jpg

item.s: Organize and create your work area .
You 'll need spaces for making and decorating bangles , shipping orders and handling correspondence , marketing and orders .
Get advice from an attorney , small business advisor or accountant about how to start a bangle selling business , including handling taxes , insurance and licensing .
Find out whether to set up your company as a corporation or sole proprietorship .
Register your business with the IRS .
You can either register in your name , or come up with a name for your business and then register the name . Get necessary local and state licenses .
Call your local zoning office or business association to find out what licenses you need .

figure.rend: Start a Bangle Selling Business Step 5.jpg

item.s: Team up with other craftspeople .
Look for people who make jewelry or accessories that are complimentary to your bangles .
Join together to sell your products wholesale or retail .

figure.rend: Start a Bangle Selling Business Step 6.jpg

item.s: Come up with a marketing plan of how to sell and advertise your handmade jewelry .
Places to sell include local boutiques , craft shops , party and holiday related stores and jewelry stores .
Set up shops on Etsy , eBay or other online storefronts and boutiques .
Consider adding other handmade jewelry items to increase sales .

figure.rend: Start a Bangle Selling Business Step 7.jpg

item.s: Read books , get information online , and take local or online classes to learn the practical aspects of running a home business .
Learn how to keep records , do basic accounting and market your products .

figure.rend: Start a Bangle Selling Business Step 8.jpg

item.s: Create a website and other online profiles .
A blog can help personalize your bangles , show how they can be used and make it easier to find your bangles .
Create profiles on social networking sites , especially Facebook , Myspace and Flickr .
Promote your handmade jewelry on forums and sites that your customers visit , like mom forums to promote childrens ' bangles for children or fashion related sites to market products for adults .
